attributes.action: offer more support in schools for dyslexic children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Offer more support to dyslexic children in school.  As a specific learning disability that cannot be seen, dyslexia is all too often overlooked and not understood by most people.  Imagine trying to read letters all jumbled up all of the time and see how you manage to cope with life without becoming frustrated and labelled 'stupid'.  Please offer some support.
